summary: This document is an index of materials produced in response to a grand jury subpoena in the civil case against Ghislaine Maxwell (15 Civ. 7433). It lists pleadings, orders, discovery productions, and numerous deposition transcripts and exhibits from 2016-2017, providing a comprehensive catalog of evidence and testimony gathered in the investigation.

persons.context: The central defendant in the civil case (15 Civ. 7433). Her depositions from April 22, 2016, and July 22, 2016, are listed.

connections.description: Both are key figures in the case, with Maxwell being the defendant in the civil case and Epstein being the accused. Their depositions were taken as part of the same discovery process.
Alessi was a staff member (likely at Epstein's properties) who was deposed. His testimony would relate to Maxwell's activities.

locations: MAR-A-LAGO (listed as a non-party production source)
keyFacts: The document is an index of materials produced in response to a grand jury subpoena in the civil case Ghislaine Maxwell (15 Civ. 7433).
It catalogs a vast amount of discovery, including depositions of over 20 individuals from 2016-2017, such as Ghislaine Maxwell (twice), Jeffrey Epstein, and numerous staff and witnesses.
The index references a sealed order dated April 9, 2019, related to the grand jury subpoena, indicating ongoing criminal investigative activity parallel to the civil case.
Non-party productions listed include 'MAR-A-LAGO' and 'VICTIMS_REFUSE_SILENCE', suggesting the scope of evidence gathered from various properties and victim advocacy sources.
The materials were loaded to a ShareFile system on April 18-19, 2019, providing a timestamp for the compilation of this evidence index.
